remarks: 'Less than' relationship between subtraction and addition. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
statement:
leidd.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
ltnegd.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
ltadd1d.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. RR ) $.
ltsub23d.4 $e |- ( ph -> ( A - B ) < C ) $.
ltsub23d $p |- ( ph -> ( A - C ) < B ) $.
